Header: State Minister of Defence Extends Greetings to New Commander
Content: Lieutenant General Shavendra Silva, Commander of the Army upon assumption of his office made his first formal courtesy call on Hon State Minister of Defence, Mr Ruwan Wijewardene at the State Ministry of Defence this morning (3). During the cordial meeting, Minister Wijewardene extended his best wishes and greetings to the new Commander of the Army and assured his best support for performance of the Commanderâ€™s duties. The brief meeting culminated after the Commander of the Army presented a memento to Hon Minister as a symbol of goodwill.
